# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/firmata`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for firmata.js (http://www.github.com/firmata/firmata.js).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/firmata.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Thu, 08 Jul 2021 12:01:38 GMT
 * Dependencies: [@types/serialport](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/serialport), [@types/node](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/node)
 * Global values: none
